title: 2021 Oscars presenters are a 'truly stellar cast of stars'
body: "There’s so much wattage here, sunglasses may be required." 'GMA' reveals 1st round of Oscar nominations"There’s so much wattage here, sunglasses may be required."That's the way show producers Jesse Collins, Stacey Sher and Steven Soderbergh described the "truly stellar cast of stars" who will be presenting at the 93rd annual Academy Awards on April 25.Stars who will be on stage, envelopes in hand, include Angela Bassett, Halle Berry, Bong Joon Ho, Don Cheadle, Bryan Cranston, Laura Dern, Harrison Ford, Regina King, Marlee Matlin, Rita Moreno, Joaquin Phoenix, Brad Pitt, Reese Witherspoon, Renée Zellweger and Zendaya.More stars will be announced in the coming days.The 93rd Oscars will be held on Sunday, April 25, at Union Station Los Angeles, the Dolby Theatre at the Hollywood & Highland Center and international locations via satellite, and will be broadcast live on ABC starting at 8 p.m. Eastern.Check out the full list of nominations for the 93rd Academy Awards .Visit  for Oscar 2021 highlights and watch live Sunday, April 25, on ABC at 8 p.m. ET/5 p.m. PT.
